text: N’igihe twavuga duti:- nimwinjire muri iki gisagara hanyuma mufungure mwidegemvya aho mushaka hose, kandi mwinjire murugi rwayo n’ubugamburutsi ntangere, kandi muvuge muti:- tugirire ikigongwe kubera ibicumuro vyacu, natwe tuzoba girira ikigongwe c’amakosa yanyu, kandi tuzobongereza ineza kuri bamwe bagira ineza
